title: Lite Notebook · openai/gpt-oss-20b · Beginner
description: Token‑light tutorial: environment setup + runnable calls. Uses OpenAI SDK against selected provider (Poe/OpenAI‑compatible/local).
learning_objectives: Configure provider and API key correctly
Run a model call with safe defaults
Record simple telemetry or ranking step

steps.title: Environment & Client Setup
steps.content: Configure an OpenAI-compatible client pointed at Poe and confirm the model you plan to use.

steps.title: First Chat Completion
steps.content: Send your brief to the model with safe defaults and review the reply.

steps.title: Adjust Parameters
steps.content: Contrast two temperatures to see how the narrative changes.

assessments.question: Which env var provides the Poe key?
assessments.explanation: Poe auth uses POE_API_KEY; the code maps it to OPENAI_API_KEY at runtime.
